name: AmazingAdventCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask amazing advent calendar to open today's door”
”Alexa, ask amazing advent calendar to open door number 2”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazing advent calendar
Developer Terms of Use
des: Amazing Advent Calendar brings eco friendly joy to your festive season. Open days on your virtual advent calendar. Listen to the amusing gifts that are hidden behind each door. Laugh with your friends at the funny sounds and festive quips.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
